about.heading: What We Do
about.description: We help experienced developers and investors secure the right capital for their deals. Every project is different, so we design structures around your asset, plan, and timeline.

text_paragraphs.paragraph: DCM Financing is a premier commercial lending firm that provides customized financing solutions for seasoned investors and developers across various industries. With years of experiences we  understands the unique challenges and opportunities in complex commercial real estate financing.
We work closely with our clients to structure loans that align with their business objectives, whether they're acquiring new properties, refinancing existing debt, or funding development projects.

financing_approach.heading: Financing Approach
financing_approach.description: We do not push a product. We tailor capital to fit the asset and the business plan. That can include senior debt, construction financing, bridge solutions, takeout strategies, and creative gap coverage when needed. The goal is simple, get you closed on strong terms with clear execution.

thinking_points.point: Understand the deal story and risks early
Map the capital stack to the timeline and exit
Target lenders who already like this exact profile
Negotiate for speed, certainty, and flexibility

testimonials.author: Michael Johnson
testimonials.text: DCM Financing provided the capital we needed to acquire our new headquarters. Their team was professional, responsive, and delivered exactly what they promised.

testimonials.author: Sarah Williams
testimonials.text: The refinancing solution from DCM helped us improve cash flow during a challenging period. Their expertise in commercial real estate was evident throughout the process.

testimonials.author: Robert Chen
testimonials.text: We've worked with several lenders over the years, but DCM's approach is different. They truly understand our business and provide solutions that support our growth.

process_steps.title: Discovery
process_steps.description: Share your project, timeline, and goals. We give fast feedback on fit.

process_steps.title: Structure
process_steps.description: We shape the capital plan and target the right lenders. You receive a clear path forward.

process_steps.title: Process and close
process_steps.description: We manage diligence, negotiate terms, and keep closing on schedule.

services.title: Commercial Real Estate Acquisition
services.description: We secure purchase financing through our direct relationships with lenders and banks that fund stabilized and value-add assets. Clean packaging and quick answers so you can close with confidence.

services.title: Ground-Up Development
services.description: We line up construction lenders and banks we work with directly. Draws, contingencies, and interest reserves are matched to your build schedule.

services.title: Conversions
services.description: We speak directly with lenders and banks that understand change-of-use risk. We address permits, phasing, and lease-up to reach firm terms.

services.title: Hotel Financing
services.description: We work daily with hotel lenders and banks. We present brand, management, and market performance the way credit teams expect.

services.title: Nursing Home Facilities
services.description: We have direct lines to healthcare lenders and banks. We package census, reimbursements, and operator track record to support reliable capital.

services.title: South America Hotel Financing
services.description: For select projects, we coordinate with banks and capital partners active in key South American markets. We handle cross-border details to keep the deal moving.
